name: Adding an extra item to a list with heaps more items

testSteps.description: Given that Jane has a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog

children.description: Jane starts with **a todo list containing Buy some milk, Walk the dog**
Jane opens the Application home page
Jane adds the todo items called: [Buy some milk, Walk the dog]
Jane adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
Jane enters 'Buy some milk' into 'What needs to be done?' field
Jane adds a todo item called: Walk the dog
Jane enters 'Walk the dog' into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: When she adds 'Buy some cereal' to her list

children.description: Jane adds a todo item called: Buy some cereal
Jane enters 'Buy some cereal' into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: Then her todo list should contain Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal

exception.message:
Expected: <[Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal]>
     but: was <[Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal]>

stackTrace.methodName: Then her todo list should contain Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal

children.description: Then the displayed todo items should be ([Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal])

exception.message:
Expected: <[Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal]>
     but: was <[Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal, Buy some milk, Walk the dog, Buy some cereal]>

userStory.narrative:
In order to avoid having to remember things that need doing
As a forgetful person
I want to be able to record what I need to do in a place where I won't forget about them
